silly.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: not sensible, or showing bad judgment
silly.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: You made a lot of silly mistakes.
I left my keys at home, which was a pretty silly thing to do.
‘Shall we go for a walk?’ ‘Don’t be silly, it’s dark.’
silly.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: stupid in a childish  or embarrassing way
silly.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: I feel so silly in this outfit.
I hate their parties – we always end up playing silly games.
silly.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: They served us coffee in these silly little cups.
silly.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: used to tell someone that you think they are not behaving sensibly
silly.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: No, silly, I didn’t mean that.
